mapper.insert: insert into member_info(MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NICK, MEM_AGE, MEM_GENDER, MEM_HEIGHT, MEM_WEIGTH, MEM_GOAL, MEM_ACTIVITY, MEM_CALORIE, MEM_CRB, MEM_PROTEIN, MEM_FAT) values (#{MEM_ID}, #{MEM_PW}, #{MEM_NICK}, #{MEM_AGE}, #{MEM_GENDER}, #{MEM_HEIGHT}, #{MEM_WEIGTH}, #{MEM_GOAL}, #{MEM_ACTIVITY}, #{MEM_CALORIE}, #{MEM_CRB}, #{MEM_PROTEIN}, #{MEM_FAT})
mapper.select: select * from member_info where mem_id = #{MEM_ID} and mem_pw = #{MEM_PW}
